content: I can say that including more interactive elements in their shows could be a great strategy for discovery to engage their viewers and make their content even more enjoyable. interactive elements such as quizzes, games, and other challenges could create a more dynamic and engaging experience for viewers. these elements can also help to increase viewership and engagement by encouraging viewers to interact with the content beyond simply watching it. interactive content could also attract younger audiences who are accustomed to interactive experiences and enjoy being an active participant. therefore, if discovery decides to incorporate interactive elements in their shows, it could be a smart move that appeals to audiences looking for a more engaging viewing experience.
